name: Black Diamond Momentum Rock Shoes - Women's
description: A gym-centric shoe that balances fit with breathability. The knit upper has a variable weave that provides both airflow and support. The inner liner uses hemp to absorb moisture – nice when the air in the gym feels tropical. It uses propriatary BD rubber that's designed to last through long gym seasons while you hone your strength and technique.Engineered Knit tech in the upper provides exceptional fit, breathability and comfort.Hemp liner in the toe box helps manage moisture and reduce the chance of blisters.Neutral, flat last offers comfort and support for developing climbers.4.3mm NeoFriction rubber is designed for durability, consistency and lightness.Soft flex midsole adds sensitivity for the perfect foot placement.2 Velcro straps tune the fit.Members typically size the same as their street shoe size.
